One-dimensional geometry in which all variables depend only on the z (normal) coordinate.

$$
d B_y / d z=\sum_\alpha(-n_\alpha u_{\alpha x}+\Gamma_\alpha B_x / B_z)
$$

$$
d B_x / d z=\sum_\alpha(n_\alpha u_{\alpha y}-\Gamma_\alpha B_y / B_z)
$$

$$
\Gamma_e=\sum_\alpha n_\alpha u_{\alpha z}=\sum_\alpha \Gamma_\alpha
$$

We are interested in solution that have $d B_y / d z \neq 0$
